title: Disable chat completely
body: Now before everyone jumps on my case with some dumb ass bullshit thinking i want to get ride of it because of idiots and what they say, that is not the case. I want to disable chat for the people who are in the same game as me sake's. I am naturally toxic. I will not hold back in game especially when i want to win, but i don't want to be punished for being who I am. So just give me the option to completely remove chat. pings should be sufficient.

replies.body: Dude, get one of those squishy stress toys or a cat.......... or a girlfriend. {{champion:150}}

> [{quoted}](name=Android Cowboy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=s05nVq5b,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-06-21T18:02:25.641+0000)
>
> Dude, get one of those squishy stress toys or a cat.......... or a girlfriend. {{champion:150}}
I have a girlfriend lol and that's not going to make me not toxic

What the heck kind of logic is that? Imagine if a thief tried to use the same justification. 

"I am a natural thief so just take away the stuff that I can steal"

You could, y'know, NOT be toxic!

> [{quoted}](name=injourn,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=s05nVq5b,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-06-21T05:56:31.571+0000)

> 
> "I am a natural thief so just take away the stuff that I can steal"
> 
> You could, y'know, NOT be toxic!

Those are two totally different things, the fact you even tried to compare them makes me think you either 12 or an idiot. I can't help the fact that people on this game get offended easily and I can't stop myself from being harsh, so the only way to meet at middle ground is to let me disable my chat completely.

Here we have the ad hominem fallacy in action. As well as the refusal to improves one's self disguised as an inability. 

I really don't understand how it is so hard just to not be toxic. Never mind the fact that there are already several ways to disable the chat, but no just like every thing you want it to be clear and cut like a fucking child. I honestly can't take you seriously because if you were looking to turn off chat or not be toxic, you would know this.

P.S. You also don't seem to know how analogies work.

Dear Dairy,

When i grow up i want to be a jerk. I also want to do what ever i want and have no consequences.

3. If you want to win, then you'd do nothing that would reduce your chances of winning. Being toxic reduces your chance of winning. You don't  seem to really want to win.
